metadata.title: CVE-2016-2070 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The tcp_cwnd_reduction function in net/ipv4/tcp_input.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(divide-by-zero error and system crash) via crafted TCP traffic.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
